alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 2:50PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Snow Showers Continue into the Evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to moderate snow with additional accumulations around an inch. Gusty northeast wind will create blowing snow. * WHERE...Southeast Wind River Mountains and central Wyoming mountains, including Red Canyon and South Pass. * WHEN...Now through this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times. Blowing and drifting snow is possible. This includes Wyoming Highway 28 around Red Canyon and over South Pass, and US 287 from Lander to Jeffrey City.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Mountains East
